Task1.description: Image Upload and Display Component Implementation
Task1.task_description: Implement a comprehensive image upload and display component with drag-and-drop, validation, thumbnails, and S3 integration
Task1.details: Create a React component that handles image uploads with drag-and-drop functionality, file validation, thumbnail display, and S3 storage integration. Using Material UI for UI components and AWS SDK for S3 operations. Component should include responsive design and performance optimization through lazy loading.

Task1SubTask1.description: Set up component structure and S3 service
Task1SubTask1.details:
Created initial component structure including directories and base files for ImageUpload and ImageDisplay components. Implemented S3 service for image operations using AWS SDK. Created:
- src/services/s3Service.js
- src/components/ImageUpload/ImageUpload.js
- src/components/ImageDisplay/ImageDisplay.js

Task1SubTask2.description: Implement drag-and-drop and file upload functionality
Task1SubTask2.details: Implemented drag-and-drop functionality with enhanced visual feedback, multiple file upload support, progress tracking, and improved error handling. Added clear visual states for drag events and proper loading indicators.

Task1SubTask3.description: Implement image display and gallery features
Task1SubTask3.details: Implemented image gallery with responsive grid layout, thumbnail display, sorting options, and lazy loading. Added loading spinners and improved error states for individual images. Enhanced visual feedback and user interaction states. Improved responsive design with proper breakpoints and consistent spacing across different screen sizes.

Task1SubTask4.details:
Implemented comprehensive unit tests for both ImageUpload and ImageDisplay components including:
1. Visual feedback and animation tests
2. Drag and drop functionality tests
3. Responsive design tests across different viewports
4. Loading states and error handling tests
5. Accessibility and keyboard navigation tests
6. Modal interactions and transitions tests

Task1SubTask5.details:

Remaining items:
